articles.title: One More Power Station Comes On-line
articles.content:
One More Power Station Comes On-line
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Unchonggang Power Station No. 3 in Ryanggang Province went operational with due ceremony on Sunday.
					 The people in the province carried out a huge construction project despite difficulties and trials.

articles.title: Anniversary of Buddhist Federation of Korea Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Buddhist Federation of Korea Marked
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting to mark the 65th anniversary of the Buddhist Federation of Korea (BFK) took place here on Dec. 26. 
					 Present there were office-bearers of the Central Committee and provincial, city and county committees of the BFK and priests of temples from across the country. Monks and believers in Pyongyang also took part.
					
					 Most Venerable Sim Sang Jin who is chairman of the C.C., the BFK made a report.
					
					 He, reviewing the path covered by the BFK for 65 years, said it enjoyed religious freedom under the deep care and warm solicitude of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il. He also looked back on its successes in the efforts to boost cooperation and exchange between Buddhists in the north and the south and reunify the country true to the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 He called on all the Buddhists to make tangible contribution to opening a gate to a thriving nation in 2012. 
					
					 He underscored the need for them to turn out in Dharma-minded concord in the struggle against the Lee Myung Bak conservative forces, a group of traitors driving the situation to the brink of a war against reunification after totally scuttling the north-south relations.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun: Yonphyong Shelling Exercise Is another Provocation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun: Yonphyong Shelling Exercise Is another Provocation
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- South Korea's Yonphyong Island shelling exercise on Dec. 20 is a grave infringement upon the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK. This provocation is aimed at "defending the illegal northern limit line".
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					 The puppet military warmongers chose Yonphyong Island among many islands of south Korea. This reveals the provocative nature of the exercises.
					
					 South Korea tries to get the illegal "northern limit line" recognized. But this is intolerable as it sparks off confrontation and conflict and strains the tension between the north and the south.
					
					 The recent shelling is more dangerous and grave than the previous one in November. The repeated provocation discloses south Korea's intention to make showdown with the DPRK to the last. 
					
					 However, with nothing can the puppet warmongers cover up their warlike nature. 
					
					 The south Korean warmongers are harassers of peace on the Korean Peninsula and war maniacs. They are now trying hard to blame the DPRK for starting the "provocation" but no one will lend an ear.
					
					 The recent shelling did not spill over to an all-out war entirely thanks to the maximum patience and restraint exerted by the DPRK for peace and detente on the peninsula. The warmongers should not misjudge the patience of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever put under control the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers' act against peace with the powerful self-defensive measure.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Japan's Submissive Diplomacy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Japan's Submissive Diplomacy
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Japan is working hard to hold a responsible post in the United Nations. It had better come to its sense and right its diplomatic attitude kowtowing to the U.S. before eyeing the UN post, says Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article Sunday.
					 Japan's servile diplomacy has no independence, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Historically Japan has drawn water to its mill with the backing of big countries. In the relations with the U.S. it is reading its face, dancing to its tune.
					
					 It is proven by Japan's sovereignty being violated in the strategic demand and interests of the U.S.
					
					 Whole Japanese territory is being offered as military bases of the U.S. and its forces are granted extraterritorial rights. They are rampaging throughout Japan, committing all sorts of crimes and seriously threatening the life and security of the Japanese people.
					
					 The issue of transfer of the U.S. military base in Futenma shows Japan's submission to the U.S. giving priority to the strategic demand of the U.S.
					
					 The Japanese government has no ability to defend the dignity, security and rights of the Japanese people even in its land.
					
					 The deceptive plot being hatched by Japan with the U.S. master behind the curtain of the "three non-nuclear principles" also proves the mean diplomatic attitude of Japan serving the U.S.
					
					 Japan is actively taking part in the U.S. smear campaign against the DPRK. This is also product of Japan's servile diplomacy.
					
					 Irony is that Japan made a fuss over the conspiratorial "Cheonan" case, saying that it would "take the lead if south Korea requires the UNSC resolution".
					
					 It is ridiculous for Japan to try to become the permanent member of the UNSC as it is not aware of even where it stands.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Noble Traits of Korean People
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Noble Traits of Korean People
Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday dedicates an article to the 15th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries". The work was published on December 25, Juche 84 (1995.)
					 Kim Jong Il in the work proved that respecting the forerunners of the revolution is the requirement of the revolution and a noble moral obligation to be possessed by revolutionaries. He elucidated the importance of taking proper stand and attitude toward the revolutionary forerunners in accomplishing the cause of socialism and principled matters arising in developing relations based on the noble moral obligation.
					
					 The bylined article said that since the work was published, history witnessed brilliant annals recorded with the noblest history of perpetuating the memory of President Kim Il Sung under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il. It also witnessed admirable victory-decorated course in which a steady continuity was given to the fighting traits and spirit of the forerunners of the revolution, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The Korean people personified the noble revolutionary moral obligation. Their lofty traits can be seen in that they are turning out in carrying out the behests of Kim Il Sung, giving continuity to the fighting traits and spirit of the preceding generation and giving full play to the traits of revolutionary comradeship in the whole society.
					
					 The Korean people are waging nationwide vigorous offensive for opening a gate to a thriving nation on socialist Korea of Juche shining with the august name of the President.
					
					 They worked the miracle of reclaiming tideland for  flat cropland, braving the rough sea in the spirit that Korea can do everything once it is determined. They also opened up a wide avenue for a great surge by setting up the Juche iron production system and laying solid foundation of independent national economy. This heroic stamina of the Korean people is shining as epic in the history of building a thriving nation.
					
					 Korean-style socialism has rosy future and the Korean revolution is sure to emerge ever-victorious as all the Koreans personify the revolutionary view of morality.

articles.title: Int'l Women's Federation Supports Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Int'l Women's Federation Supports Korea's Reunification
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Executive Committee of the Women's International Democratic Federation adopted a declaration supporting the Korean people and women in their efforts for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. It was held in Mozambique from December 15 to 18.
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula remains extremely tense due to the military provocation of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet military warmongers, the declaration said, and went on:
					
					 The heroic Korean People's Army promptly took a resolute physical counter-action against the provokers and the south Korean warmongers upon their violation of the territorial waters of the DPRK.  Recognizing it as just self-defensive step no one can find fault, the federation strongly urges the U.S. and south Korea to immediately stop the reckless military provocation and war exercises on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Korea should be reunified based on the three charters for national reunification, the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration. We urge the U.S. to replace the Korean Armistice Agreement with a peace agreement and withdraw its armed forces from south Korea without delay.

articles.title: Indian Organization Denounces S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Provocation
articles.content:
Indian Organization Denounces S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Provocation 
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association in a statement on Dec. 20 denounced the military provocation committed by the south Korean military warmongers against the DPRK.
					 Expressing deep concern over the touch-and-go situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the south Korean puppet military forces, the statement strongly demanded the south Korean authorities immediately stop the DPRK-targeted provocation.
					
					 When the U.S. and south Korean military forces kicked off war maneuvers, the DPRK exercised utmost self-restraint to keep the situation on the peninsula from turning worse and protect peace and stability, said the statement.  
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities perpetrated the military provocations, a reckless and unjustifiable war act, under the patronage of the United States, charged the statement, adding:
					
					 Peace and security of the peninsula are closely related to peace and security in Asia and the rest of the world. 
					
					 If the military provocation committed by the south Korean authorities bring a grave war disaster to the peninsula, the U.S. and south Korea are to blame for all the consequences. 
					
					 We fully support the just self-defensive struggle and efforts of the government and people of the DPRK for peace and security on the peninsula. 
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea should immediately stop war exercises and military provocations against the DPRK.

articles.title: Austrian Preparatory Committee for Celebrating 2.16 Formed
articles.content:
Austrian Preparatory Committee for Celebrating 2.16 Formed
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- An Austrian preparatory committee for celebrating February 16, 2011 was formed in Vienna on Dec. 17. 
					 February 16 is the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Adolf Wurzer, general secretary of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events on the occasion.

articles.title: Peruvians to Commemorate Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Peruvians to Commemorate Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung 
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Peruvian preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was held in Lima on Dec. 17.
					 Felix Fernandes Torres, secretary general of the preparatory committee, made a report which was followed by speeches.
					
					 They reviewed success and experience gained this year and called for stirring up festive atmosphere nationwide by putting all ability into use with enthusiasm next year.
					
					 They stressed the immediate need to work out bigger plan for next year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mongolia
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" was brought out in pamphlet by the Mongolian Centre for the Study of Juche on Dec. 18.
					 The work, published on Mar. 1, Juche 82 (1993), lays bare the reactionary nature and absurdity of sophism that socialism is "totalitarian," "barracks-like" and "administrative and commanding" let loose by the imperialists and renegades of socialism.
					
					 It also clarifies the principled issues arising in defending the cause of socialism and accomplishing it including the issues of regarding socialism as faith, putting it on a moral basis and giving full play to its advantages.

articles.title: DPRK Anniversaries Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK Anniversaries Marked Abroad 
 Pyongyang, December 26 (KCNA) -- A lecture and photo exhibition were held in Finland, a seminar in Pakistan and round-table talks in Indonesia on Dec. 17 and 18. They are to celebrate the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero.
					 Displayed at the exhibition were photos on the undying Songun leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's gaining of the KPA supreme commandership helped strengthen it into a reliable revolutionary army for carrying forward the President's cause of army-building generation after generation and defending the socialist system in the DPRK, said the chairman of the Finnish Communists' League. 
					
					 It is entirely the result of the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il that the DPRK has legitimately defended its dignity and sovereignty against the persistent military threat and arbitrary practices of the U.S. and other imperialists, he said, adding:
					
					 The KPA has grown to be a matchless army strong in idea under the leadership of Kim Jong Il and is creating feats in building socialist economy.
					
					 The Korean people are praising Kim Jong Suk as the model of devotedly defending the leader who distinguished herself in upholding Kim Il Sung, peerlessly great man of the Korean nation.
					
					 She is not only the mother of the nation who devoted her whole life to the freedom and independence of the country and the happiness of its people but great revolutionary who performed outstanding feats in carrying forward the revolutionary cause of the President generation after generation.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event in Pakistan.
